channel.title: Mics on Osmedeus Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Mics on Osmedeus Documentation

item.title: Security Concern
item.description: Overview Because main feature of Osmedeus is allow execute command on your system so make sure you secure it. If you run default config Osmedeus only can access via your localhost. Turn off Debug mode in server/rest/settings.py # SECURITY WARNING: don't run with debug turned on in production! DEBUG = True Access remote via SSH tunnel (easiest way) You can also achieve remote access in safe method using SSH.
